title: FS: t206 Roger Bresnahan batting SC30
author: tonyo

posts.post_title: FS: t206 Roger Bresnahan batting SC30
posts.post_content:
For Sale: t206 Roger Bresnahan batting SC30

$72 delivered

Presents well in a binder -  nice colors and well centered, has the requisite factory stack in the background,  but it does have that unfortunate tear upper right.  think of it as heat lightning in the summer sky.

Here is a link to zoomable photos on google drive: [url]https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1oLSzAsXIsKxCODAE9RoJUk4TVMo2e-Zy?usp=sharing[/url]
